Object.Name: CmdhBuffer
Object.Description1: This Object defines limits in usage of buffers for temporarily storing information that needs to be forwarded to other CSEs during processing of CMDH-related requests in a CSE.

Item.Name: ApplicableEventCategory
Item.Description: Contains a list of event category values

Item.Name: MaxBufferSize
Item.Description: Contains the max Buffer size of the CmdhBuffer Object Instance

Item.Name: StoragePriority
Item.Description: Storage priority for the buffered data associated to that CmdhBuffer Object Instance. t Buffered requests associated with a lower storage priority shall be purged before buffered requests with a higher storage priority.
